akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. July 3, 1948, ch. 827, title II, § 203(b), 62 Stat. 1256

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1322a. Repealed. July 3, 1948, ch. 827, title II, § 203(b), 62 Stat. 1256
Section, act July 26, 1939, ch. 378, 53 Stat. 1125, related to time for proclamation of referendum.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Jan. 1, 1950, see section 303 of act July 3, 1948, set out as a note under section 1301 of this title.
